title: Why Bitcoin Could Surge 184% in 2026, According to This Billionaire Investor
description: There are plenty of talking heads in the crypto sector to listen to. Many have long-standing bullish views on certain tokens. title: Coinbase Shares Could Gain 106%, Says Wall Street Pro
description: Shares of Coinbase (NASDAQ:COIN) have been moving steadily lower in recent months, now down close to 50% from its all-time peak in July 2025, thanks in part to the retreat in Bitcoin (CRYPTO:BTC) and the broader crypto markets. title: UBS Unlocks Crypto Vault: Bitcoin, Ether Trading for Swiss Elites
description: UBS plans Bitcoin and Ether trading for select Swiss private clients, marking a cautious entry into crypto amid client demand and rival pressure. Expansion to Asia and U.S. looms as blockchain pilots pave the way.
